name: Burner
description: 'Burner' is a variation on the original 'Godje'. The variation was made while integrating it in 'Don't panic', an animation containing 24 animations made for an exhibition. (A line is a line is line, CCStrombeek, Belgium.) 2015 CR 807 https://hansup.be/2015_burner_animation_hans-verhaegen.html
